array.string: ColdFusion (2025 release) has modified the usage of cfobject tag. The value 'com' for the type attribute has been removed.
Check the usage of the attribute type of the tag cfobject.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed the value 'fire_now' for the onmisfire attribute.
Use firenow value instead of fire_now.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed a system function named HTMLEditFormat.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed a system function named ParameterExists.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has modified the usage of system function SetLocale. The possible value 'Spanish (Mexican)' for the SetLocale argument has been removed.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed a system function named cfmediaplayer.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed a system function named ReleaseComObject.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has modified the usage of system function CreateObject. The value 'com' for the parameter 'type' has been removed.
Check the usage of the parameter 'type' of the function CreateObject.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed a system function named StoreSetACL.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed a system function named StoreAddACL.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed cfapplet tag.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed cftree tag.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed cfclient tag.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed cfclientsettings tag.

ColdFusion (2025 release) has modified the usage of cfslider tag. The attributes align, bgcolor, bold, font, fontsize, hspace, italic, label, lookandfeel, message, notsupported, onvalidate, scale, textcolor and vspace have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes align, bgcolor, bold, font, fontsize, hspace, italic, label, lookandfeel, message, notsupported, onvalidate, scale, textcolor and vspace of the tag cfslider.
align, bgcolor, bold, font, fontsize, hspace, italic, label, lookandfeel, message, notsupported, onvalidate, scale, textcolor, vspace

ColdFusion (2025 release) has modified the usage of cfgrid tag. The attributes align, colheaderalign, colheaders, gridlines, highlighthref, space, notsupported, onvalidate, picturebar, rowheaderalign, rowheaderbold, rowheaderfont, rowheaderfontsize, rowheaderitalic, rowheaders, rowheadertextcolor, sortascendingbutton, sortdescendingbutton, sort, space and vspace have been removed.

Check the usage of the attributes align, colheaderalign, colheaders, gridlines, highlighthref, space, notsupported, picturebar, rowheaderalign, rowheaderbold, rowheaderfont, rowheaderfontsize, rowheaderitalic, rowheaders, rowheadertextcolor, sortascendingbutton, sortdescendingbutton, sort, space and vspace of the tag cfslider.

align, colheaderalign, colheaders, gridlines, highlighthref, space, notsupported, picturebar, rowheaderalign, rowheaderbold, rowheaderfont, rowheaderfontsize, rowheaderitalic, rowheaders, rowheadertextcolor, sortascendingbutton, sortdescendingbutton, sort, space, vspace
ColdFusion (2025 release) has modified the usage of system function GetMetricData. The cachepops parameter has been removed.
Check the usage of system function GetMetricData.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed a system function named GetTemplatePath.
Use GetBaseTemplatePath method as an alternative.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has modified the usage of cfthread tag. The value 'terminate' for the attribute 'action' has been removed.
Check the usage of the attribute action of the tag cfthread.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has added a system function named ThreadInterrupted.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has added a system function named isThreadInterrupted.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has added a system function named InterruptThread.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed a system function named ThreadTerminate.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has added a system function named StructValueArray.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has added a system function named ListGetDuplicates.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has modified the usage of system function DeserializeJSON. An optional parameter has been added to preserve case sensitive structs.
Check the usage of system function DeserializeJSON.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has modified the usage of system function Duplicate. An optional parameter has been added to specify whether child elements also need to be cloned.
Check the usage of system function Duplicate.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has modified the usage of system function Javacast. It now supports two-dimensional arrays as well.
Check the usage of system function Javacast.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has modified the usage of CFQuery tag. A new attribute cachemaxidletime has been added.
Check the usage of the attribute cachemaxidletime of the tag CFQuery.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has modified the usage of CFOauth tag. 4 new attributes have been added - granttype, refreshtoken, providerConfig, client_assertion.
Check the usage of the attribute granttype of the tag CFOauth.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has modified the usage of CFCatch tag. It can now accept multiple types separated by '|' character.
Check the usage of the attribute type of the tag CFCatch.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has added a system function named XmlClear.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has added a system function named XmlDeleteAt.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has added a system function named XMLHasChild.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has updated the function Rand with 'SHA1PRNG' as the new default algorithm instead of 'CFMX_COMPAT'.
Check the usage of system function Rand.
CColdFusion (2025 release) has updated the function Randomize with 'SHA1PRNG' as the new default algorithm instead of 'CFMX_COMPAT'.
Check the usage of system function Randomize.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has updated the function RandRange with 'SHA1PRNG' as the new default algorithm instead of 'CFMX_COMPAT'.
Check the usage of system function RandRange.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has updated the function Encrypt with 'AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding' as the new default algorithm instead of 'CFMX_COMPAT'.
Check the usage of system function encrypt.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has updated the function Hash with 'SHA_256' as the new default algorithm instead of 'CFMX_COMPAT'. Also, an optional parameter has been added to specify output encoding.
Check the usage of system function hash.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has updated the function EncryptBinary with 'AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding' as the new default algorithm instead of 'CFMX_COMPAT.
Check the usage of system function encryptBinary.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has updated the function Decrypt with 'AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding' as the new default algorithm instead of 'CFMX_COMPAT'.
Check the usage of system function decrypt.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has updated the function DecryptBinary with 'AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding' as the new default algorithm instead of 'CFMX_COMPAT'.
Check the usage of system function decryptBinary.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has updated the function GeneratePBKDFKey with setting 'AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding' as the new default algorithm instead of 'CFMX_COMPAT'.
Check the usage of system function generatePBKDFKey.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has added a system function named XmlUpdate.
ColdFusion (2023 release) has added a system function named GetGraphQLClient.
ColdFusion (2023 release) has added a system function named GenerateGraphQLModels.
ColdFusion (2023 release) has added a system function named SerializeAvro.
ColdFusion (2023 release) has added a system function named DeserializeAvro.
ColdFusion (2023 release) has added a system function named SerializeProtobuf.
ColdFusion (2023 release) has added a system function named DeserializeProtobuf.
Deprecated. Starting with ColdFusion (2023 release), the wrapText attribute will be ignored.
Check the usage of the attribute wrapText of the tag CFMailpart.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has modified the usage of cfheader tag. The attribute statusText has been removed.
Check the usage of the attribute archive of the tag cfheader.
ColdFusion (2023 release) has modified the usage of CFHtmltopdf tag.
Check the usage of the attribute conformance of the tag CFHtmltopdf.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named ArrayPush.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named ArrayPop.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named ArrayShift.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named ArrayUnshift.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named ArrayReduceRight.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named ListReduceRight.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named GetMongoService.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named MongoObjectIdNew.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named MongoRegExpNew.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named MongoDBRefNew.

ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named GetMongoBsonMinKey.

ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named GetTimeZone.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named ClearTimeZone.

ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named StringFilter.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named StringReduce.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named StringReduceRight.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named StringMap.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named StringEach.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named StringEvery.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named StringSome.

ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named VerifySCryptHash.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named GenerateBCryptHash.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named VerifyBCryptHash.

ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named GenerateSAMLSPMetadata.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named GetSAMLAuthRequest.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named GetSAMLLogoutRequest.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named InitSAMLAuthRequest.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named InitSAMLLogoutRequest.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named ProcessSAMLResponse.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named ProcessSAMLLogoutRequest.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named SendSAMLLogoutResponse.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named IsSAMLLogoutRequest.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named IsSAMLLogoutResponse.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named GetLambdaContext.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named GetLambdaEvent.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named BeginAWSXraySubsegment.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named EndAWSXraySubsegment.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named AddAWSXrayMetadata.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named GetKeyPairFromKeystore.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has added a system function named StructIsCaseSensitive.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has introduced static scope, static variable would now be reserved for scoping.
Do not use variable named static, or disable static support within CFC by setting property supportStatic to false
ColdFusion (2021 release) has modified the usage of CFPresentation tag. The usage of the attribute Format has been modified.
Ensure that format attribute is present and not set to empty value ""

ColdFusion (2021 release) has modified the behaviour of a system function named QueryFilter. The function no longer mutates the given input query, and returns a new object instead of modifying the given one.
To preserve the old behaviour, set JVM flag coldfusion.query.filter.mutateinputquery to true.
ColdFusion (2018 release) has modified the usage of CFDocument tag. The usage of the attribute FlashPaper has been retired.
Check the usage of the attributes useWebkit of the tag CFDocument.
ColdFusion (2018 release) has modified the usage of CFFunction tag. The attributes of the tag have been modified.
Check the usage of the CFFunction.
ColdFusion (2018 release) has removed cftree tag.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed cfmenu tag.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed cfcalendar tag.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed cfsprydataset tag.
ColdFusion (2018 release) has deprecated the attribute requesttimeout for the tag cfschedule.
Check the updated doc of tag cfschedule.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed the attribute fieldBoost,docBoost for the tag cfindex.
Check the updated doc of tag cfindex.
ColdFusion (2018 release) has modified the usage of CFSet tag. Closures are now supported in tag syntax as well.
Check the usage of the CFSet.
ColdFusion (2018 release) has added a system function named RunAsync.
ColdFusion (2018 release) has added a system function named StructIsOrdered.
ColdFusion (2018 release) has added a system function named ArrayFirst.
ColdFusion (2018 release) has added a system function named cachegetengineproperties.
ColdFusion (2018 release) has added a system function named ArrayLast.
ColdFusion (2018 release) has added a system function named QueryDeleteRow.
ColdFusion (2018 release) has added a system function named QueryDeleteColumn.
ColdFusion (2018 release) has added a system function named onRestRequest.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named StructToSorted.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named SpreadsheetGetColumnCount.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named QuerySort.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named QueryReduce.
ColdFusion (2021 release) has modified the usage of system function CreateObject. The value 'corba' for the parameter 'type' has been removed.
Check the usage of the parameter 'type' of the function CreateObject.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named QueryMap.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named EncodeFor.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named ArrayContainsNoCase.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named ArrayDeleteNoCase.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named BooleanFormat.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named ExceptionKeyExists.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named Floor.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named IsPDFArchive.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named QueryEach.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named QueryFilter.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named QueryKeyExists.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named ReplaceListNoCase.
ColdFusion 2016 has added a system function named ValueArray.
ColdFusion 2016 has modified the usage of CFCache tag. The attributes of the tag have been modified.
Check the usage of the CFCache.

ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed the path attribute. All the collections will be created in the collections directory at the location specified in Solr_Home field in the ColdFusion administrator page
Do not use the attribute path of the tag CFCollection.
ColdFusion 2016 has modified the usage of CFSpreadSheet tag.
Check the usage of the attribute autosize of the tag CFSpreadSheet.
ColdFusion 2016 has modified the usage of CFloop tag.
Check the usage of the tag CFloop.

ColdFusion 2016 has modified the usage of CFQuery tag. The usage of attributes cachedAfter and scale have been updated and the attributes connectString, DBName, DBServer, provider, providerDSN and sql have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes cachedAfter, scale, connectString, DBName, DBServer, provider, providerDSN and sql of the tag CFQuery.

ColdFusion 2016 has modified the usage of CFStoredProc tag. The usage of the attribute cachedAfter has been updated and the attributes connectString, DBName, DBServer, DBType, provider and providerDSN have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes cachedAfter, connectString, DBName, DBServer, DBType, provider and providerDSN of the tag CFStoredProc.
ColdFusion 2016 has modified the usage of CFDBInfo tag. The attribute datasource is now an optional attribute.
Check the usage of the attribute datasource of the tag CFDBInfo.
ColdFusion 2016 has modified the usage of CFDocument tag. The attribute useWebkit has been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes useWebkit of the tag CFDocument.
ColdFusion 2016 has modified the usage of CFPdf tag.
Check the usage of the tag CFPdf.
ColdFusion 2016 has modified the usage of CFPDFParam tag. The attribute source is now a required attribute.
Check the usage of the attribute source of the tag CFPDFParam.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cflog tag. The attributes date, thread and time have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes date, thread and time of the tag cflog.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cferror tag. The value 'monitor' for the exception attribute has been removed.
Check the usage of the attribute exception of the tag cferror.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfgridupdate tag. The attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, dbType, provider and providerDSN have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, dbType, provider and providerDSN of the tag cfgridupdate.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfinsert tag. The attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, dbType, provider and providerDSN have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, dbType, provider and providerDSN of the tag cfinsert.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfstoredproc tag. The attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, dbType, provider and providerDSN have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, dbType, provider and providerDSN of the tag cfstoredproc.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfupdate tag. The attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, dbType, provider and providerDSN have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, dbType, provider and providerDSN of the tag cfupdate.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfquery tag. The attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, provider, providerDSN and sql have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes connectString, dbName, dbServer, provider, providerDSN and sql of the tag cfquery.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of dbType attribute of cfquery tag. Some possible values of dbType attribute have been removed.
Check the usage of the dbType attribute of cfquery tag.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfcache tag. The attributes cachedirectory and timeout have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes cachedirectory and timeout of the tag cfcache.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cffile tag. Some possible values of attributes attribute have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes attribute of the tag cffile.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfftp tag. The attribute agentname has been removed.
Check the usage of the attribute agentname of the tag cfftp.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfldap tag. The attribute filterFile has been removed.
Check the usage of the attribute filterFile of the tag cfldap.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfcollection tag. Some possible values of action attribute have been removed.
Check the usage of the action attribute of the tag cfcollection.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfform tag. The attributes passThrough and enableCAB have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes passThrough and enableCAB of the tag cfform.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfinput tag. The attribute passThrough has been removed.
Check the usage of the attribute passThrough of the tag cfinput.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has modified the usage of cfsearch tag. The attribute external has been removed and attribute language has been deprecated.
Check the usage of the attributes external of the tag cfsearch.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfselect tag. The attribute passThrough has been removed.
Check the usage of the attribute passThrough of the tag cfselect.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cfslider tag. The attributes img, imgStyle, grooveColor, refreshLabel, tickmarkimages, tickmarklabels, tickmarkmajor and tickmarkminor have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes img, imgStyle, grooveColor, refreshLabel, tickmarkimages, tickmarklabels, tickmarkmajor and tickmarkminor of the tag cfslider.
ColdFusion 11 has modified the usage of cflocation tag. If Secure Profile is enabled, default value for addtoken attribute will be false.
Check the usage of the attribute addtoken of the tag cflocation.

Check the usage of the attribute access_token of the tag cfexchangemail.

Check the usage of the attribute access_token of the tag cfexchangecalendar.

ColdFusion 11 has added a system function named structMap.
ColdFusion 11 has added a system function named structReduce.
ColdFusion 11 has added a system function named writeBody.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has modified the usage of cfchart tag. The value 'flash' for the format attribute has been removed. 3 new attributes have been added - showScaleMarkers, markers, theme.
Check the usage of the attributes format, showScaleMarkers, markers and theme of the tag cfchart.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has added a new tag CFChartset.
Check the usage of the tag CFChartset.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has modified the usage of cfchartseries tag. 2 new attributes have been added - rules, dataFormat.
Check the usage of the attributes rules and dataFormat of the tag cfchartchartseries.

ColdFusion (2025 release) has modified the usage of cfinput tag. The attributes sourceForToolTip, autosuggest, autosuggestBindDelay, autosuggestMinLength, delimiter, maxResultsDisplayed, showAutosuggestLoadingIcon, and typeahead have been removed.

Check the usage of the attributes sourceForToolTip, autosuggest, autosuggestBindDelay, autosuggestMinLength, delimiter, maxResultsDisplayed, showAutosuggestLoadingIcon, and typeahead of the tag cfinput.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed cftable tag.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed cfcol tag.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed the support for sybase driver.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed cfformitem tag.
ColdFusion (2025 release) has removed cfformgroup tag.

ColdFusion (2025 release) has modified the usage of cfform tag. The values 'xml' and 'flash' for the attribute 'format' and the attributes 'accessible', 'archive', 'codeBase', 'height', 'skin', 'timeout' and 'width' have been removed.
Check the usage of the attributes accessible, archive, codeBase, format, height, skin, timeout and width of the tag cfform.
